name: Apple
details: A sweet and crunchy fruit rich in fiber and vitamin C.

name: Banana
details: A soft and energy-rich fruit high in potassium and vitamin B6.

name: Orange
details: A juicy citrus fruit packed with vitamin C and antioxidants.

name: Mango
details: A tropical fruit known for its sweet taste and rich vitamin A content.

name: Grapes
details: Small, juicy berries that can be eaten fresh or used for making wine.

name: Pineapple
details: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy taste, rich in vitamin C.

name: Watermelon
details: A refreshing fruit with high water content, perfect for hydration.

name: Strawberry
details: A red, juicy fruit with a sweet taste and high in antioxidants.

name: Papaya
details: A tropical fruit known for its digestive benefits and rich vitamin C content.

name: Blueberry
details: A small, sweet berry loaded with antioxidants and vitamins.
